title: Quiz
content:
Chapter Quiz

Answer the following questions to check your understanding of this chapter's topics.

questions.question: In the context of 'State and Callbacks', which statement about callback orchestration is most accurate?
choices: Callback Orchestration always requires external services to work in Streamlit.
Callback Orchestration is useful in some cases, but you should evaluate complexity and UX trade-offs.
Callback Orchestration is deprecated and should be avoided in all Streamlit apps.
Callback Orchestration only works when running Streamlit in Docker.
questions.explanation: Callback Orchestration is a powerful pattern, but like most advanced techniques, it should be used judiciously with attention to user impact and maintainability.
